value.name: In fatal Kansas City police shooting case, judge denies motion to dismiss charges
value.description: Eric DeValkenaere, 42, was indicted last year on charges of first-degree involuntary manslaughter and armed criminal action in the Dec. 3, 2019, killing of 26-year-old Cameron Lamb. He was shot ...

value.name: ‘Nothing has been done’: Sister of man shot by officer visits Kansas City police board
value.description: Doug Shafer, a longtime Kansas City resident, spoke of Cameron Lamb, who was fatally shot in December 2019 while sitting in his pickup truck in his own backyard at 41st Street and College Avenue.

value.name: Judge won't dismiss charges against Kansas City detective
value.description: He’s accused of shooting Cameron Lamb, 26, on Dec. 3, 2019. Jackson County Judge David Byrn denied the motion to dismiss charges on Wednesday. TOP STORIES Biden snaps at Coast Guard graduates ...

value.name: Stop Asian Hate leans into legacy of civil rights to spark movement, dismantle racism
value.description: Kayla Reed stood in a line of dozens of people along the sidewalk near West 119th Terrace and Grant Street as she held up her South Korea flag. They were all gathered to support Asian Americans. They gathered in defiance as hate against those communities hit a fatal crescendo.

mentions.name: Opposition to United States involvement in the Vietnam War
